channel.title: CVE Feed for Mozilla -- Persona
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mozilla -- Persona

item.title: CVE-2013-4227|2024-08-06T16:38:01.670Z -- mozilla -- persona
item.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in the persona_xsrf_token function in persona.module in the Mozilla Persona module 7.x-1.x before 7.x-1.11 for Drupal allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication of aribitrary users via a security token that is not a string data type.
